startMessage: Welcome to Spoonacular - we are excited to serve you with some delicious recipes
inputRequest: Please enter ingredients of your choice:
ingredientsContinue: Do you wish to add more ingredients? Enter (yes/y) to continue else (no/n):
continue: Do you wish to continue? Press (yes/y) to continue else (no/n) to stop shopping anytime:
invalidInput: Oops! It seems you mistyped something there
getRecipes: Great! You entered these ingredients {ingredient_list}, sit back and relax while we get some recipes just for you!
invalidIngredient: Oh o, it seems you missed entering your ingredient
recipeLikeDislike: Did you like this recipe? Press (yes/y) if you did else (no/n) to see new recipes, else enter (exit/EXIT) anytime:
